ROS EEL Example

This is an example of using EEL with ROS. The following components are available:

  • ROS Subscribers
  • ROS Publishers
  • ROS Params
  • Tabs

ROS Subscribers

/eel_subtest/bool

/eel_subtest/int32

/eel_subtest/int64

/eel_subtest/float32

/eel_subtest/float64

/eel_subtest/string

/eel_subtest/transform

/eel_subtest/pose

/eel_subtest/image

ROS Publishers

/eel_pubtest/bool

/eel_pubtest/string

/eel_pubtest/int32

ROS Params

/eel_paramtest/bool

/eel_paramtest/number

/eel_paramtest/string

/eel_paramtest/enum Radio

/eel_paramtest/enum Select

/eel_paramtest/object Object

Tabs
